item.description:
Join Larry and the NH Collective's at Anna Liffey's Friday night for 

"Shiver"

Shiver is a party rock band that has been crisscrossing the state since early 2006. Comprised of talented musicians from such former bands as Bad Kittie, Chain Reaction, Lost, Tymepeace, Shotgun Serenade, Inside Out to name just a few, Shiver delivers a high energy show that leaves you wanting more. Playing the music you want to hear from the past to the present, you won’t go away disappointed, you'll leave saying "I have to see them again". Remember...."When You Rock, We Rock".......til next time....Shiver and Shake!!

"Shiver" will be playing downstairs at 10pm.  The band plays a HUGE variety of music from famous groups you might know like: AC/DC, Aerosmith, Alice In Chains, All-American Rejects, Ataris, Beastie Boys, Billy Idol, Billy Joel, Bon Jovi, Bowling for Soup, Buckcherry, Cheap Trick, Def Leppard, Fall Out Boy, Foo Fighters, Free, Fuel, Gavin DeGraw, Godsmack, Goo Goo Dolls, Good Charlotte, Green Day, Guns-N-Roses, Heart, Jet, Journey, Kiss, Led Zeppelin, Lenny Kravitz, Lit, Maroon 5, Metallica, Michael Jackson, Motley Crue, Nickelback, The Outfield, Poison, Puddle of Mudd, Queen, Rage Against the Machine, Saliva, Shinedown, Sponge, Stone Temple Pilots, Sublime, The Toadies, Tommy Tutone, Tool, Trapt, U2, Van Halen, Wild Cherry and many more!  (Ok I know that list is a mouth full.)

You may want to also check out their Facebook,http://www.facebook.com/shiverrocks?ref=ts

There will be a cover charge to get in the door, expected to be in the $3-$5 range.

ALSO*** Playing upstairs at 9pm, you can see "SELL THE KIDS", a Nirvana cover band featuring NHC's very own Meredith filing in on Bass!  So if you're in the mood for some good 90's music get there a little early and stop upstairs! ***

 

There will be a cover charge to get in the door, expected to be in the $3-$5 range.

Larry is hosting this meetup, and will  be getting there to stake out a spot around 9:30.  He can be reached at 203-446-2226 if you have trouble finding him or have any questions.

Anna Liffey's is a charming old Irish Pub in Downtown New Haven.  You can find some good pub food and friends here just about any day. Located on Whitney Avenue, just after it changes over from Church Street, with a big old Irish Flag out front.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Shiver @ Anna Liffey's in New Haven
